About.Hours & facilities: Archives room is closed to the public. Requests for information are available via the principal, who may refer the request to the archivist.

About.Acquisition focus: The history of the Knox School (since 1996), Knox Grammar Victoria (1995-1996) and Knoxfield College (1982-1995).

About.Major holdings: The school archives are 100% in-house but will accept significant documents, photographs and memorabilia from past students and staff.
